topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack(R) Carrier Grade (Beta): Changing the DNS Server Configuration

body.p: You can change the DNS servers defined for the Titanium Server at any time after installation.
You change these addresses using the Horizon dashboard or the CLI.

section.title: Change the IP address using the Horizon Dashboard

li.p: Launch the HPE Helion OpenStack(R) Horizon Dashboard.

ul.li: Use the IP address for the appropriate region where you want to make the change, either: the hLinux region or the Wind River Linux region.

li.p: The System Configuration pane is available from the System Panel section of the Admin menu.
The DNS page appears, showing the currently defined DNS servers and their IP addresses.
The Edit DNS dialog box appears.
Replace the DNS Server IP addresses with different ones as required.
